recipe.title: Yellow and Green Bean Salad with Olives, Cherry Tomatoes and Summer Savory
instructions: Bring a medium pot of salted water to a boil. Cook beans until cooked through but firm, about 7 minutes; rinse with cold water. Mix remaining ingredients in a bowl; add beans and toss. Serve.
